name: Coin Block Bash
description:
50 Devs Remake Mario Party

This game was made as part of a challenge hosted by Jirushi and the Devlogs Club – which consists of BLANKdev, Whateep, and Andrew David.

You can check out their content here:
 Devlogs Club Channel: https://youtube.com/channel/UC-7VQ2Lf6r81I6-2y007EHg 
Devlogs Club website: https://devlogs.club/
Jirushi: https://youtube.com/channel/UCuVScY6j4BMOMzeK6yPiLSQ 
BLANKdev: https://youtube.com/BLANKdev 
Whateep: https://youtube.com/whateep 
AndrewDavidJ: https://youtube.com/andrewdavidj

50 devs were rounded up and we each picked a mini game from Mario Party to remake in our own style. I picked Coin Block Bash, and by 'picked' I mean it was the last one available as I was late to the ... party LOL. 

As Construct 3 is limited in the 3D realm I had to remake it in 2D which was a really fun challenge. 

The Game

It's a 1 v 3 mini game. Play single player and control the hammer, hit blocks and other players to collect coins. Play 2 player mode and player 1 controls the hammer and player 2 joins the group of 3 with 2 AI players. When the timer runs out the team with the most coins wins. Simple! 

Video will be released on 22nd September: https://www.youtube.com/xanderwoodgamedev

Watch the devlog on the making of this game and all the other remakes in the series over on my YouTube channel.
